content.rendered:
ACADEMIC YEAR 2025-2026

Note:

No fee is charged for the month of July and August.

New admissions must pay the first three (3) months of the tuition fee in full.

How to Pay the Tuition Fee

Please note that if you choose to make fee payments directly through the bank (as per the bank account details provided), you are kindly requested to share the deposit slip with the school reception via WhatsApp at +971 52 143 0029.
Once the payment is confirmed in our account, an official receipt will be issued and sent through the same channel.

Title of Account: H.H. Sheikh Rashid Al Maktoum Pakistan School
Account Number: 200403843
IBAN Number: AE520470000000200403843
Bank Name: United Bank Limited
Bank Address: Bur Dubai Branch, Khalid Bin Waleed Street P.O. Box 1367, Dubai, UAE

We are pleased to share that H.H. Shaikh Rashid Al Maktoum Pakistani School has successfully introduced Zenda, a secure and user-friendly platform to simplify school fee payments. The response from parents has been overwhelmingly positive.

As one of the UAE’s leading payment and financing apps, Zenda is trusted by over 100,000 parents across 200+ schools in 2 countries. We’re delighted that so many of our parents are benefiting from the convenience and flexibility it provides.

With the zenda app, parents can

  • Pay fees instantly online using card or bank transfer
  • Split their fees into installments using the ‘Pay Later’ option
  • Earn rewards, points and cashbacks from their bank

All parents are requested to use the zenda app for fee payments for the upcoming academic year and take advantage of its benefits.

Download zenda from here: app.zenda.com/getstarted or by using the QR code below. To log in, use your registered email/mobile with the school.

If you have any questions, please contact the school.
